snippet: On the reality show that Donald Trump began hosting in 2004, he displayed the showmanship and other traits that have come to define his 2016 presidential campaign....
abstract: Donald J Trump, presumptive Republican nominee for president, probably honed his self-promotion and showmanship skills during his 11-year stretch starring in NBC series The Apprentice; show, which highlighted Trump as successful business mogul, made him popular international media sensation and gave him visibility he could bank on during his 2016 presidential campaign.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: On the reality show that Donald Trump began hosting in 2004, he displayed the showmanship and other traits that have come to define his 2016 presidential campaign.

headline.main: Donald Trump the Political Showman, Born on ‘The Apprentice’
